participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, always looking for ways to connect with others through shared interests.
participant_1.background: I would have lunch with my brothers to thank them for their support. I work part time at Aldi's. I have a journal that I've been writing in since I was a teenager. I make over 200,000 per year. I want to move to London when I get older.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Charismatic and humorous, with a love for cooking and sharing experiences with friends and pets.
participant_2.background: I'm a pretty short guy, but I make up for it with my big personality. I love the freedom of being my own boss. I enjoy Budweiser beer. I'm a meataholic with a furry best friend as my ring bearer. My favorite TV shows are the ones I can watch with my dog.

content.text: Hello! My name is John. What's yours?
I'm (user 1's name). What do you do for a living?
I'm self-employed, I run my own business.
Oh, that's cool. What kind of business?
Wow, that's awesome! I love cooking.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun.
What kind of food do you like to cook?
I love to cook all kinds of food, but my specialty is Italian.
Really? That's great! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! What are your favorite Italian dishes to cook?
I love making pasta dishes, like spaghetti and meatballs, lasagna, and ravioli.
Those are all my favorites too!
Awesome! We should cook together sometime.
Great! We can exchange recipes and cook up a storm.
